hero.title: Products, education, and technical support for salons & barbershops.
hero.lede: PT Alfa Beauty is a professional beauty distribution company dedicated to providing products, education, and technical support for salons and barbershops in Indonesia.
points: Curated portfolio: professional brands selected for consistent real‑world performance.
Education & support: practical training and technical guidance for your team.
WhatsApp-first consultation: recommendations and ordering without public pricing.
hero.note: No public pricing. For consultation and product recommendations, contact us via WhatsApp.

about.title: About
about.body: PT Alfa Beauty is a professional beauty distribution company dedicated to providing products, education, and technical support for salons and barbershops in Indonesia. We represent carefully selected international brands and work as a strategic partner to professionals, ensuring every product we distribute delivers consistent performance and is supported by proper technical knowledge.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.body: To provide professional beauty partners with premium cosmetic products and comprehensive business support, enabling their success in the beauty industry.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.body: To become Indonesia's leading B2B beauty distribution platform, recognized for quality products, reliable service, and empowering partnerships.

quality.title: Quality
quality.body: We curate only the finest cosmetic products that meet international standards.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.body: We grow together with our partners, providing education and continuous support.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.body: We strive for operational excellence in every aspect of our business.

cta.title: Ready to Partner With Us?
cta.body: Join thousands of beauty professionals who trust Alfa Beauty for their business needs.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: For consultation, product recommendations, and partnership inquiries, reach us via WhatsApp.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp
whatsapp.body: Fastest response. Chat with our team directly.

cta.title: Ready to Start?
cta.body: Our team is ready to help you grow your beauty business. Reach out today and let's discuss how we can support your success.

products.title: Products
products.body: Curated professional brands — designed to support consistent performance in real-world use.

education.title: Education
education.body: Training and technical knowledge to help your team apply products correctly.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.body: A strategic partner for salons and barbershops — no retail gimmicks, no public pricing.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.lede: We work as a strategic partner for salons and barbershops: curated products, education, and technical support. B2B-first, professional, no retail gimmicks.

curated.title: Curated portfolio
curated.body: Access carefully selected brands supported by real-world technical knowledge.

education.title: Education & support
education.body: Training, product knowledge, and support to help your team deliver consistent results.

b2b.title: B2B-first
b2b.body: Designed for professionals — B2B-first, no retail gimmicks, no public pricing.

readyBlock.title: Ready to become a partner?
readyBlock.body: Submit your details and we'll follow up. We save your request before confirming success.

becomePartner.title: Become a Partner
becomePartner.lede: Tell us a bit about your business. Our team will follow up within 24 hours.

next.title: What happens next
items: We review your details and reach out via WhatsApp/phone/email.
We recommend suitable products and training options.
No public pricing — consultation happens via WhatsApp.

becomePartner.formLede: Fill out the form below and our team will contact you within 1-2 business days.
becomePartner.privacyNote: Your information is secure. We respect your privacy and will only use your data to process your partnership application.

products.title: Products
products.lede: Curated products for salons and barbershops. No public pricing — contact us via WhatsApp for consultation and recommendations.

highlights.title: Featured products
highlights.lede: A quick look at our curated portfolio.

empty.title: No results
empty.body: Try clearing filters, or contact us on WhatsApp for recommendations.

consultCta.title: Need help choosing products?
consultCta.body: Message us on WhatsApp for consultation, product recommendations, and ordering.

intro.body: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect information when you use this website or contact us.

informationWeCollect.title: Information we collect
items: Information you submit via the Partnership lead form (e.g., business name, contact, WhatsApp, city).
Basic technical/analytics data for performance and reliability (e.g., CTA clicks, RUM metrics).
Information you provide when contacting us via WhatsApp/email.

howWeUse.title: How we use information
items: To respond to product consultation requests and partnership inquiries.
To improve the website (stability, performance, and user experience).
To prevent spam and abuse in the lead pipeline.

storageSecurity.title: Storage & security
storageSecurity.body: We store lead submissions before confirming success, and use reasonable security measures to protect information from unauthorized access.

cookies.title: Cookies & similar technologies
cookies.body: We may use cookies/similar technologies for analytics and performance. You can manage cookies via your browser settings.

contact.title: Contact
contact.body: If you have questions about this policy, please contact us via the Contact page or WhatsApp.

intro.body: These Terms explain how you may use this website and its content.

websiteUse.title: Website use
websiteUse.body: This website provides product information, education highlights, and consultation/partnership pathways for salon & barbershop professionals.

noPublicPricing.title: No public pricing
noPublicPricing.body: We do not publish public pricing. Consultation, recommendations, and ordering happen via WhatsApp.

limitations.title: Limitations
limitations.body: Content is provided as-is. We aim for accuracy, but information may change over time.

changes.title: Changes
changes.body: We may update these terms from time to time. The latest version will be published on this page.

hub.title: Education & Events
hub.lede: Concise, technical, and relevant for salon & barbershop professionals. Paket A does not include ticketing—registration happens via WhatsApp.
hub.trainingNote: Want training for your team? Message us on WhatsApp and tell us your city and needs.

notFound.title: Event not found
notFound.body: We couldn't find that event. Please return to Education.

event.note: Note: Schedules may change. Confirm availability via WhatsApp.
event.contactBody: Contact us to learn more about this event and reserve your spot.

notFound.title: Article not found
notFound.body: We couldn't find that article. Please return to Education.

article.footer: Need guidance for a specific product? Send your questions via WhatsApp.

consult.title: Consult & request recommendations
consult.body: No public pricing. Message us on WhatsApp for suitability, usage guidance, and ordering.
consult.prefill: Hi Alfa Beauty, I'd like to consult about {{product}}.

leadForm.consent: I consent to be contacted for partnership follow-up.

success.title: Thank you — we received your details.
success.body: Our team will follow up. You can also message us on WhatsApp for faster consultation.
success.whatsappPrefill: Hi Alfa Beauty, I just submitted my partnership application and would like to discuss further.

errors.rateLimited: Too many requests. Please try again in a moment.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.body: The page you're looking for doesn't exist. Please use the navigation or go back home.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.body: Please try again. If this keeps happening, contact us via WhatsApp.

footer.blurb: Professional beauty distribution for salons and barbershops in Indonesia.
